member.name: T:Triamec.Tama.TamaProgram
member.summary: Contains members for dealing with compiled Tama programs.

member.name: F:Triamec.Tama.TamaProgram.BinaryFileExtension
member.summary:
The extension used for binary files containing a Tama program.
The value is "tama".

member.name: M:Triamec.Tama.TamaProgram.GetBinaryFileName(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the name of the binary file generated by the compiler from the specified type.
member.param: Type defining the Tama program.
member.returns: A file name including extension.

member.name: F:Triamec.Tama.TamaProgram.IntermediateFileExtension
member.summary:
The extension used for assembler source files depicting a Tama program.
The value is "asm".

member.name: T:Triamec.Tama.Registers.ITamaArray`1
member.summary: Array of writable leaf registers in a Tama program.

member.name: P:Triamec.Tama.Registers.ITamaArray`1.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.

member.name: P:Triamec.Tama.Registers.ITamaArray`1.Length
member.summary: Gets a number that represents the total number of elements in this array.

member.name: T:Triamec.Tama.Registers.ITamaReadOnlyArray`1
member.summary: Array of read-only leaf registers in a Tama program.

member.name: P:Triamec.Tama.Registers.ITamaReadOnlyArray`1.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the element at the specified index.

member.name: P:Triamec.Tama.Registers.ITamaReadOnlyArray`1.Length
member.summary: Gets a value that represents the total number of elements in this array.

member.name: M:Triamec.Tama.Vmid5.Math.Acos(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose cosine is the specified number.
member.param: A number representing a cosine, where -1 <= <= 1.
member.returns: An angle, theta, measured in radians, such that 0 <= theta <= Pi.

member.summary: Returns the angle whose sine is the specified number.
member.param: A number representing a sine, where -1 <= <= 1.
member.returns: An angle, theta, measured in radians, such that -Pi/2 <= theta <= Pi/2.

member.summary: Returns the angle whose tangent is the specified number.

member.summary: Returns the angle whose tangent is the specified number.

member.name: M:Triamec.Tama.Vmid5.Math.Atan2(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose tangent is the quotient of two specified numbers.
member.param: The y coordinate of a point.
The x coordinate of a point.
member.returns:
An angle, theta, measured in radians, such that -Pi <= theta <= Pi, and tan(theta) = / , where (, ) is a point in the Cartesian plane. Observe the following:
For (, ) in quadrant 1, 0 < theta < Pi/2.
For (, ) in quadrant 2, Pi/2 < theta <= Pi.
For (, ) in quadrant 3, -Pi < theta < -Pi/2.
For (, ) in quadrant 4, -Pi/2 < theta < 0.

member.name: M:Triamec.Tama.Vmid5.Math.Atan2(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns the angle whose tangent is the quotient of two specified numbers.
member.param: The y coordinate of a point.
The x coordinate of a point.
member.returns:
An angle, theta, measured in radians, such that -Pi <= theta <= Pi, and tan(theta) = / , where (, ) is a point in the Cartesian plane. Observe the following:
For (, ) in quadrant 1, 0 < theta < Pi/2.
For (, ) in quadrant 2, Pi/2 < theta <= Pi.
For (, ) in quadrant 3, -Pi < theta < -Pi/2.
For (, ) in quadrant 4, -Pi/2 < theta < 0.

member.name: F:Triamec.Tama.Vmid5.TamaAttribute.VirtualMachineId
member.summary: The ID of the virtual machine, or more precise, its opcode definitions, that is used by the compiler to resolve instructions into opcodes. The value is 0x00000005.
